;ActiveX Controls Selections
;Do not Edit the lines below, Doing so may make information not display correctly.

[ActiveX.d3DLine]
Info1=Update
Info2=Added Vertical Line support
Info3=Add 3D Line support for your applications

[ActiveX.dAnimated Cursor]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Support of playing animated cursors on your forms

[ActiveX.dBevel]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Add Bevel effects to your applications

[ActiveX.dBmpStrip]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Support the playing of bitmap strips on your forms

[ActiveX.dBrowse Folder]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Using the browse for Folder Dialog in your applications

[ActiveX.dButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Stylish Button for your applications

[ActiveX.dCDMenuList]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Styleish List box with support for Icons, Text, Colours

[ActiveX.dChangeIcon]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Support the Change Icon Dialog Box in your applications

[ActiveX.dCheckBox]
Info1=Update
Info2=Added Hover In and Hover Out Events
Info3=Replacement Checkbox with many features.

[ActiveX.dCheckButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Check Button Control with picture support

[ActiveX.dCheckPanel]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Stylish Panel with support for checkboxes

[ActiveX.dColorButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Button that updates with a selected colour of your choice

[ActiveX.dColorPallete]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=MS Paint Style palette for your applications

[ActiveX.dColorPanel]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Modem Colour Panel control

[ActiveX.dCSV]
Info1=New
Info2=Unfinished Control
Info3=Support Reading and Writing CSV files in your applications

[ActiveX.dCtrColorSet]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Control used to set the colour of all controls on a form

[ActiveX.dDotNetButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=VB.NET Style Button

[ActiveX.dFilePatten]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Control to add file filter support for File List Boxes

[ActiveX.dFlash]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Control to flash the Title bar of a form

[ActiveX.dFlatButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=Few Bug Fixes
Info3=Flat style button with menu features

Info1=Old

Info3=Control to give your form a Gradient effect

[ActiveX.dGradientPanel]
Info1=Old

Info3=Add Modem Gradient Panels to your applications

Info1=Old

Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Create Modem style Installers

Info3=Gives your users a view of the Install process in your applications

[ActiveX.dPanel]

Info1=Old

[ActiveX.dSpinButton]
Info1=Old
Info2=

[ActiveX.dStatusbar]
Info1=Update

Info3=Lightweight status bar Control

[ActiveX.dSwitch]
Info1=Update

Info3=Smart little graphic switch button with many features.

[ActiveX.dTabStrip]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Small lightweight tab Strip Control

Info1=Old

Info1=New

[ActiveX.dRichEdit]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Allow simple RTF in your appliactions without an OCX


;Class Selections
;Do not Edit the lines below, Doing so may make information not display correctly.

[Class.dChecksum]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=CRC Checksum Class

[Class.dDataMerge]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Class to allow you to append data to the end of an application and Extract it

[Class.dDateLimit]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Class used to add Time limit to your applications

[Class.dExec]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Class to allow you to execute programs / Open Folders and More.

[Class.dINI]
Info1=Update
Info2=Added Rename Selection
Info3=Class to work with INI files

[Class.dMouseHover]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Class to add Hover In and Hover Out events to any control

[Class.dRecentList]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=Add recent opened file list to your applications

[Class.dStringContainer]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=String Collection Container with many features

[Class.dTextBoxClass]
Info1=New
Info2=This class has now replaced the ActiveX Control
Info3=Add extra features to the standard Textbox Control

[Class.dTextValidate]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Make your Textboxes support only valid data you set them

[Class.dValueList]
Info1=Old
Info2=
Info3=String collection that can support adding values

[Class.dFileOps]
Info1=New
Info2=
Info3=Large collection of file and path functions to save you many hours of codeing
